Text:
If you would like more of these MSTS routes etc
Please leave a comment.
I`ve only just found out how to put these up here.
You can ofcourse Email ( the information is inside the Rar )
But please let me know what you think,
Thankyou for Downloading and Please SEED.
leave comments please and mail me if ou want - all comments are cool - so please leave them - i have loads more of these - so leave a comment or i wont put them up - thanx

Hi Everyone and happy new year - i have been sharing this route i made for MSTS for some 4 months now -  12.1GB has been uploaded from my PC which i have had on for months - I`ve never had a comment (good or bad) i spent months making these so the simmers didnt get bored - well its time i moved on now to rail simulator - if you still want this here then post something - take care and have fun

Hey

Keep up the work

This looks like a great torrent.

Could some more people please seed?

Thanks

Anyone reading this should check out Nightmoods on YouTube for some excellent video tutorials and more......

It would be great to have some KRS routes with activities and stock included - there's enough freeware out there for this maybe?

Perhaps a tutorial torrent so I can DIY it!

Cheers ;)
